abstract: The airline said it was on track to deliver the first Dreamliner at the end of next year after improving supply chain problems that had led to a six-month delay in its production schedule.
snippet: The airline said it was on track to deliver the first Dreamliner at the end of next year after improving supply chain problems that had led to a six-month delay in its production schedule.
lead_paragraph: The Boeing Company said today that it was on track to deliver the first 787 Dreamliner at the end of next year after improving supply chain problems that had led to a six-month delay in its original production schedule.

headline.main: Boeing Says 787 to Meet Delayed Schedule
